pages.title: Player Buff Materials
pages.text: These materials grant passive status effects while you hold the jeweled item!

pages.title: Glowstone Dust
pages.text: $(bold)Effect:$() Night Vision +1$(br)$(bold)Color:$() Pale Yellow$(br)$(bold)Best For:$() Mining tools$(br2)See perfectly in the dark!

pages.title: Prismarine Shard
pages.text: $(bold)Effects:$() Water Breathing (Aqua Affinity) +1, Swiftness (Speed) +1$(br)$(bold)Color:$() Cyan$(br)$(bold)Best For:$() Ocean tools$(br2)Breathe underwater and move faster!

pages.title: Obsidian
pages.text: $(bold)Effect:$() Resistance +2$(br)$(bold)Color:$() Dark Purple$(br)$(bold)Best For:$() Combat gear$(br2)Reduces incoming damage!

pages.title: Golden Apple
pages.text: $(bold)Effect:$() Regeneration +2$(br)$(bold)Color:$() Gold$(br)$(bold)Best For:$() Exploration tools$(br2)Slowly regenerates your health!

pages.title: Rabbit Foot
pages.text: $(bold)Effect:$() Leaping (Jump Boost) +2$(br)$(bold)Color:$() Burlywood$(br)$(bold)Best For:$() Exploration tools$(br2)Jump much higher!

pages.title: Magma Cream
pages.text: $(bold)Effect:$() Fire Resistance +1$(br)$(bold)Color:$() Tomato Red$(br)$(bold)Best For:$() Nether tools$(br2)Immunity to fire and lava!
